name: William CURTIS, Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Respondents

parties: William CURTIS, Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 18th day of February, 2009, the Petition for Permission to File Petition for Review Nunc Pro Tunc is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
989 A.2d 342
William CURTIS, Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. BEARD, Ph.D., Commissioner, Department of Corrections, et al., Respondents.
No. 160 EM 2009.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 18, 2010.
